com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager

Class FemError

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Error
        • com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager.FemError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FemDetachedObjectError

    public class FemError
extends java.lang.Error
    Instances of this unchecked error are thrown when the file system entity manager identifies an exception condition that should not occur under ordinary conditions. The use of unchecked exceptions prevents unnecessary defensive coding.
    Author:
    simon
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FemError()
      Create new anonymous unchecked file system entity manager exception
      FemError(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Object... replacements)
      Create a new unchecked exception with the given message with all instances of '{}' replaced with the given replacements
      FemError(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause, boolean enableSuppression, boolean writableStackTrace, java.lang.Object... replacements)
      Create a new unchecked exception for the given throwable cause overriding the message with the given message template and specifying whether the exceptions can be suppressed and whether the stack trace should be writable
      FemError(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause, java.lang.Object... replacements)
      Create a new unchecked exception for the given throwable cause overriding the message with the given message template and replacement values
      FemError(java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Create a new unchecked exceptions for the given throwable cause This is used to convert checked exceptions thrown by the underlying implementation to unchecked exceptions thrown by the file system entity manager factory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FemError

        public FemError()
        Create new anonymous unchecked file system entity manager exception

      • FemError

        public FemError(java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.Object... replacements)
        Create a new unchecked exception with the given message with all instances of '{}' replaced with the given replacements
        Parameters:
        message - The message template for the unchecked exception
        replacements - The replacements for instances of '{}' in the message template

      • FemError

        public FemError(java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Create a new unchecked exceptions for the given throwable cause This is used to convert checked exceptions thrown by the underlying implementation to unchecked exceptions thrown by the file system entity manager factory. This prevents unnecessary defensive coding of exception handling. Unchecked exceptions are only thrown for unrecoverable errors.
        Parameters:
        cause - The throwable cause that gave rise to this unchecked exception

      • FemError

        public FemError(java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.Throwable cause,
                java.lang.Object... replacements)
        Create a new unchecked exception for the given throwable cause overriding the message with the given message template and replacement values
        Parameters:
        message - The message template
        cause - The throwable cause that gave rise to this unchecked exception
        replacements - The values to replace instances of '{}' in the message template

      • FemError

        public FemError(java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.Throwable cause,
                boolean enableSuppression,
                boolean writableStackTrace,
                java.lang.Object... replacements)
        Create a new unchecked exception for the given throwable cause overriding the message with the given message template and specifying whether the exceptions can be suppressed and whether the stack trace should be writable
        Parameters:
        message - The message template
        cause - The throwable cause that gave rise to the unchecked exception
        enableSuppression - Whether or not the unchecked exceptions is suppressable
        writableStackTrace - Whether or not the stack trace should be writable
        replacements - The values to replace instances of '{}' in the message template
